references.paper_title: Shape of motion: 4d reconstruction from a single video
references.reason: This paper proposes Shape of Motion, which is a 4D reconstruction method from a single video, that serves as a baseline for comparison.
This paper introduces COLMAP which is used to estimate the camera intrinsics, camera poses and a sparse point cloud from the monocular video.

references.paper_title: Pixelwise view selection for unstructured multi-view stereo
references.reason: This paper introduces COLMAP which is used to estimate the camera intrinsics, camera poses and a sparse point cloud from the monocular video.

references.paper_title: Hypernerf: A higher-dimensional representation for topologically varying neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduces HyperNeRF datasets that are used to evaluate dynamic scene reconstruction from monocular video.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduces the latent diffusion models which serves as a video diffusion models that the authors fine-tuned based on a text-to-video diffusion model.
